column1: The Federal Reserve Board on Friday released the minutes of its discount         rate meetings from July 22, 2002 to August 12, 2002.       The minutes are attached.Attachment (21 KB PDF)2002 Monetary policy Home | News and events Accessibility Last update: October 4, 2002
